verses.verse: בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> On that day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> he נָתַ֞ן <WH5414> give הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> did the king אֲחַשְׁוֵרוֹשׁ֙ <WH325> Ahasuerus לְאֶסְתֵּ֣ר <WH635> unto Esther הַמַּלְכָּ֔ה <WH4436> the queen אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> the house הָמָ֖ן <WH2001> of Haman צֹרֵ֣ר <WH6887> enemy [הַיְּהוּדִיִּים כ] (הַיְּהוּדִ֑ים <WH3064> Jew ק) וּמָרְדֳּכַ֗י <WH4782> And Mordecai בָּ֚א <WH935> came לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> the king כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הִגִּ֥ידָה <WH5046> had told אֶסְתֵּ֖ר <WH635> for Esther מַ֥ה <WH4100> what הוּא־ <WH1931> he לָֽהּ׃

וַיָּ֨סַר <WH5493> took off הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king אֶת־ <WH853> טַבַּעְתּ֗וֹ <WH2885> his ring אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which הֶֽעֱבִיר֙ <WH5674> which he had taken מֵֽהָמָ֔ן <WH2001> from Haman וַֽיִּתְּנָ֖הּ <WH5414> and gave לְמָרְדֳּכָ֑י <WH4782> it unto Mordecai וַתָּ֧שֶׂם <WH7760> set אֶסְתֵּ֛ר <WH635> And Esther אֶֽת־ <WH853> מָרְדֳּכַ֖י <WH4782> Mordecai עַל־ <WH5921> over בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> over the house הָמָֽן׃ <WH2001> of Haman פ

וַתּ֣וֹסֶף <WH3254> yet again אֶסְתֵּ֗ר <WH635> And Esther וַתְּדַבֵּר֙ <WH1696> spake לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> the king וַתִּפֹּ֖ל <WH5307> and fell down לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> at רַגְלָ֑יו <WH7272> his feet וַתֵּ֣בְךְּ <WH1058> him with tears וַתִּתְחַנֶּן־ <WH2603> and besought ל֗וֹ לְהַֽעֲבִיר֙ <WH5674> to put away אֶת־ <WH853> רָעַת֙ <WH7451> the mischief הָמָ֣ן <WH2001> of Haman הָֽאֲגָגִ֔י <WH91> the Agagite וְאֵת֙ <WH853> מַֽחֲשַׁבְתּ֔וֹ <WH4284> and his device אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which חָשַׁ֖ב <WH2803> that he had devised עַל־ <WH5921> against הַיְּהוּדִֽים׃ <WH3064> against the Jews

וַיּ֤וֹשֶׁט <WH3447> held out הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> Then the king לְאֶסְתֵּ֔ר <WH635> toward Esther אֵ֖ת <WH853> שַׁרְבִ֣ט <WH8275> sceptre הַזָּהָ֑ב <WH2091> the golden וַתָּ֣קָם <WH6965> arose אֶסְתֵּ֔ר <WH635> So Esther וַֽתַּעֲמֹ֖ד <WH5975> and stood לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> the king

וַ֠תֹּאמֶר <WH559> And said אִם־ <WH518> If עַל־ <WH5921> and הַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <WH4428> the king ט֜וֹב <WH2896> If it please וְאִם־ <WH518> and if מָצָ֧אתִי <WH4672> and if I have found חֵ֣ן <WH2580> favour לְפָנָ֗יו <WH6440> in his sight וְכָשֵׁ֤ר <WH3787> [seem] right הַדָּבָר֙ <WH1697> and the thing לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> the king וְטוֹבָ֥ה <WH2896> and I [be] pleasing אֲנִ֖י <WH589> his בְּעֵינָ֑יו <WH5869> in his eyes יִכָּתֵ֞ב <WH3789> let it be written לְהָשִׁ֣יב <WH7725> to reverse אֶת־ <WH853> הַסְּפָרִ֗ים <WH5612> the letters מַחֲשֶׁ֜בֶת <WH4284> devised הָמָ֤ן <WH2001> by Haman בֶּֽן־ <WH1121> the son הַמְּדָ֙תָא֙ <WH4099> of Hammedatha הָאֲגָגִ֔י <WH91> the Agagite אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which כָּתַ֗ב <WH3789> which he wrote לְאַבֵּד֙ <WH6> to destroy אֶת־ <WH853> הַיְּהוּדִ֔ים <WH3064> the Jews אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> who בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all מְדִינ֥וֹת <WH4082> provinces הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> which [are] in all the king's

כִּ֠י <WH3588> For אֵיכָכָ֤ה <WH349> For how אוּכַל֙ <WH3201> can I endure וְֽרָאִ֔יתִי <WH7200> to see בָּרָעָ֖ה <WH7451> the evil אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יִמְצָ֣א <WH4672> that shall come אֶת־ <WH853> עַמִּ֑י <WH5971> my people וְאֵֽיכָכָ֤ה <WH349> how אוּכַל֙ <WH3201> can I endure וְֽרָאִ֔יתִי <WH7200> to see בְּאָבְדַ֖ן <WH13> the destruction מוֹלַדְתִּֽי׃ <WH4138> begotten ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> Then the king אֲחַשְׁוֵרֹשׁ֙ <WH325> Ahasuerus לְאֶסְתֵּ֣ר <WH635> unto Esther הַמַּלְכָּ֔ה <WH4436> the queen וּֽלְמָרְדֳּכַ֖י <WH4782> and to Mordecai הַיְּהוּדִ֑י <WH3064> the Jew הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold בֵית־ <WH1004> the house הָמָ֜ן <WH2001> of Haman נָתַ֣תִּי <WH5414> Behold I have given לְאֶסְתֵּ֗ר <WH635> Esther וְאֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> תָּל֣וּ <WH8518> and him they have hanged עַל־ <WH5921> on הָעֵ֔ץ <WH6086> upon the gallows עַ֛ל <WH5921> and אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> he שָׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> because he laid יָד֖וֹ <WH3027> his hand [בַּיְּהוּדִיִּים כ] (בַּיְּהוּדִֽים׃ <WH3064> the Jew ק)

וְ֠אַתֶּם <WH859> now you כִּתְב֨וּ <WH3789> Write עַל־ <WH5921> unto הַיְּהוּדִ֜ים <WH3064> ye also for the Jews כַּטּ֤וֹב <WH2896> as it liketh בְּעֵֽינֵיכֶם֙ <WH5869> you בְּשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> name הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> in the king's וְחִתְמ֖וּ <WH2856> and seal בְּטַבַּ֣עַת <WH2885> ring הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> [it] with the king's כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for כְתָ֞ב <WH3791> for the writing אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נִכְתָּ֣ב <WH3789> which is written בְּשֵׁם־ <WH8034> name הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <WH4428> in the king's וְנַחְתּ֛וֹם <WH2856> and sealed בְּטַבַּ֥עַת <WH2885> ring הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> with the king's אֵ֥ין <WH369> else לְהָשִֽׁיב׃ <WH7725> may no man reverse

וַיִּקָּרְא֣וּ <WH7121> called סֹפְרֵֽי־ <WH5608> scribes הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Then were the king's בָּֽעֵת־ <WH6256> at that time הַ֠הִיא <WH1931> he בַּחֹ֨דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֜י <WH7992> in the third הוּא־ <WH1931> he חֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> that [is] the month סִיוָ֗ן <WH5510> Sivan בִּשְׁלוֹשָׁ֣ה <WH7969> on the three וְעֶשְׂרִים֮ <WH6242> and twentieth בּוֹ֒ וַיִּכָּתֵ֣ב <WH3789> [day] thereof and it was written כְּֽכָל־ <WH3605> all manner אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after צִוָּ֣ה <WH6680> commanded מָרְדֳּכַ֣י <WH4782> according to all that Mordecai אֶל־ <WH413> to הַיְּהוּדִ֡ים <WH3064> unto the Jews וְאֶ֣ל <WH413> and to הָאֲחַשְׁדַּרְפְּנִֽים־ <WH323> and to the lieutenants וְהַפַּחוֹת֩ <WH6346> and the deputies וְשָׂרֵ֨י <WH8269> and rulers הַמְּדִינ֜וֹת <WH4082> of the provinces אֲשֶׁ֣ר ׀ <WH834> are מֵהֹ֣דּוּ <WH1912> which [are] from India וְעַד־ <WH5704> unto כּ֗וּשׁ <WH3568> unto Ethiopia שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> and seven וְעֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> twenty וּמֵאָה֙ <WH3967> an hundred מְדִינָ֔ה <WH4082> provinces מְדִינָ֤ה <WH4082> unto every province וּמְדִינָה֙ <WH4082> to every כִּכְתָבָ֔הּ <WH3789> describe וְעַ֥ם <WH5971> thereof and unto every people וָעָ֖ם <WH5971> people כִּלְשֹׁנ֑וֹ <WH3956> after their language וְאֶ֨ל־ <WH413> to הַיְּהוּדִ֔ים <WH3064> and to the Jews כִּכְתָבָ֖ם <WH3789> describe וְכִלְשׁוֹנָֽם׃ <WH3956> and according to their language

וַיִּכְתֹּ֗ב <WH3789> And he wrote בְּשֵׁם֙ <WH8034> name הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> in the king אֲחַשְׁוֵרֹ֔שׁ <WH325> Ahasuerus' וַיַּחְתֹּ֖ם <WH2856> and sealed בְּטַבַּ֣עַת <WH2885> ring הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> [it] with the king's וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> and sent סְפָרִ֡ים <WH5612> letters בְּיַד֩ <WH3027> by הָרָצִ֨ים <WH7323> posts בַּסּוּסִ֜ים <WH5483> on horseback רֹכְבֵ֤י <WH7392> [and] riders הָרֶ֙כֶשׁ֙ <WH7409> on mules הָֽאֲחַשְׁתְּרָנִ֔ים <WH327> camels בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> [and] young הָֽרַמָּכִֽים׃ <WH7424> dromedaries

אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> who נָתַ֨ן <WH5414> granted הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> Wherein the king לַיְּהוּדִ֣ים ׀ <WH3064> the Jews אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who בְּכָל־ <WH3605> and every עִיר־ <WH5892> which [were] in every city וָעִ֗יר <WH5892> city לְהִקָּהֵל֮ <WH6950> to gather themselves together וְלַעֲמֹ֣ד <WH5975> and to stand עַל־ <WH5921> and נַפְשָׁם֒ <WH5315> for their life לְהַשְׁמִיד֩ <WH8045> to destroy וְלַהֲרֹ֨ג <WH2026> to slay וּלְאַבֵּ֜ד <WH6> and to cause to perish אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> the entire חֵ֨יל <WH2426> army עַ֧ם <WH5971> of the people וּמְדִינָ֛ה <WH4082> and province הַצָּרִ֥ים <WH6696> that would assault אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> טַ֣ף <WH2945> them [both] little ones וְנָשִׁ֑ים <WH802> and women וּשְׁלָלָ֖ם <WH7998> and [to take] the spoil לָבֽוֹז׃ <WH962> of them for a prey

בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> day אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> Upon one בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all מְדִינ֖וֹת <WH4082> in all the provinces הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> of king אֲחַשְׁוֵר֑וֹשׁ <WH325> Ahasuerus בִּשְׁלוֹשָׁ֥ה <WH7969> three עָשָׂ֛ר <WH6240> ten לְחֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH2320> month שְׁנֵים־ <WH8147> both עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> ten הוּא־ <WH1931> he חֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH2320> which [is] the month אֲדָֽר׃ <WH143> Adar

פַּתְשֶׁ֣גֶן <WH6572> The copy הַכְּתָ֗ב <WH3791> of the writing לְהִנָּ֤תֵֽן <WH5414> to be given דָּת֙ <WH1881> for a commandment בְּכָל־ <WH3605> and every מְדִינָ֣ה <WH4082> in every province וּמְדִינָ֔ה <WH4082> province גָּל֖וּי <WH1540> [was] published לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all הָעַמִּ֑ים <WH5971> unto all people וְלִהְי֨וֹת <WH1961> become [הַיְּהוּדִיִּים כ] (הַיְּהוּדִ֤ים <WH3064> Jew ק) [עֲתוּדִים כ] (עֲתִידִים֙ <WH6259> ready ק) לַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> against that day הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this לְהִנָּקֵ֖ם <WH5358> to avenge מֵאֹיְבֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH341> themselves on their enemies

הָרָצִ֞ים <WH7323> [So] the posts רֹכְבֵ֤י <WH7392> that rode הָרֶ֙כֶשׁ֙ <WH7409> upon mules הָֽאֲחַשְׁתְּרָנִ֔ים <WH327> [and] camels יָֽצְא֛וּ <WH3318> went out מְבֹהָלִ֥ים <WH926> being hastened וּדְחוּפִ֖ים <WH1765> and pressed on בִּדְבַ֣ר <WH1697> commandment הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> by the king's וְהַדָּ֥ת <WH1881> And the decree נִתְּנָ֖ה <WH5414> was given בְּשׁוּשַׁ֥ן <WH7800> at Shushan הַבִּירָֽה׃ <WH1002> the palace פ

וּמָרְדֳּכַ֞י <WH4782> And Mordecai יָצָ֣א ׀ <WH3318> went out מִלִּפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> from the presence הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king בִּלְב֤וּשׁ <WH3830> apparel מַלְכוּת֙ <WH4438> in royal תְּכֵ֣לֶת <WH8504> of blue וָח֔וּר <WH2353> and white וַעֲטֶ֤רֶת <WH5850> crown זָהָב֙ <WH2091> of gold גְּדוֹלָ֔ה <WH1419> and with a great וְתַכְרִ֥יךְ <WH8509> and with a garment בּ֖וּץ <WH948> of fine linen וְאַרְגָּמָ֑ן <WH713> and purple וְהָעִ֣יר <WH5892> and the city שׁוּשָׁ֔ן <WH7800> of Shushan צָהֲלָ֖ה <WH6670> rejoiced וְשָׂמֵֽחָה׃ <WH8055> and rejoiced
לַיְּהוּדִ֕ים <WH3064> The Jews הָֽיְתָ֥ה <WH1961> there was אוֹרָ֖ה <WH219> had light וְשִׂמְחָ֑ה <WH8057> and gladness וְשָׂשֹׂ֖ן <WH8342> and joy וִיקָֽר׃ <WH3366> and honour

וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> and every מְדִינָ֨ה <WH4082> And in every province וּמְדִינָ֜ה <WH4082> province וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> and every עִ֣יר <WH5892> and in every city וָעִ֗יר <WH5892> city מְקוֹם֙ <WH4725> whithersoever אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after דְּבַר־ <WH1697> commandment הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> the king's וְדָתוֹ֙ <WH1881> and his decree מַגִּ֔יעַ <WH5060> came שִׂמְחָ֤ה <WH8057> had joy וְשָׂשׂוֹן֙ <WH8342> and gladness לַיְּהוּדִ֔ים <WH3064> the Jews מִשְׁתֶּ֖ה <WH4960> a feast וְי֣וֹם <WH3117> day ט֑וֹב <WH2896> and a good וְרַבִּ֞ים <WH7227> And many מֵֽעַמֵּ֤י <WH5971> of the people הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> of the land מִֽתְיַהֲדִ֔ים <WH3054> became Jews כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נָפַ֥ל <WH5307> fell פַּֽחַד־ <WH6343> for the fear הַיְּהוּדִ֖ים <WH3064> of the Jews עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5921> and
